diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $2x + 4$ units.
The length of the line $DB$ is $x + 2$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is equal to the length of the line $CD$.
line_instances: There are lines $CB$, $CD$, $DB$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
